–ù–æ –Ω–µ –∫–æ–º–ø—Ä–æ–º–∏—Å—Å... MY POEM:

MY MISTRESS

She comes for me ... Every night
She falls in love with me ... Every night
She has the power to do everything with me.
Everything she wants.
And she wants a lot ...
All ... of me!
She's the one who I need to leave.
But you need to take possession of her to forget her.
In order not to think about her ...
When peace comes,
As a mirror surface,
Then, looking at the world around,
You understand‚Ä¶
Mirrors are all false!
And when this moment comes,
Metamorphosis, unexpected as a thought,
It strikes you.
And you understand:
It is much easier ‚Äì to reinvent yourself,
Than to return to the former ‚ÄúI‚Äù ...
And then she takes you by force,
She requires sex!
And those who do not give it to her,
She leaves as a reminder ... her love ...
I finally grasped the meaning of it:
My life is a struggle of the instinct and the magic ...
But not a compromise ... #mikeleceppi #–º–∏–∫–µ–ª–µ—á–µ–ø–ø–∏ #–ø–æ—ç–∑–∏—è #poem #—Å—Ç–∏—Ö–∏ #mistress #passion #love #moscow #follow4follow

–ú–∏–∫–µ–ª–µ –ß–µ–ø–ø–∏ "I was already born with sins. I grew up with them. And I somehow tried to fight them - at least until I turned into a man. But one day I realized that there were too many of them and I am losing control over them. And I realized - to control my sins, I must love them"
Mikele Ceppi

MY OWN POETRY: 
THE REBEL ANGEL
The Devil spoke to God¬†

The Devil spoke to Angels¬†
But they were silent.¬†
And he knew -¬†
That was hell.
